duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee receipt, verification, and stocking of incoming materials, as well as inventory control.
Manage receiving, inventory control personnel, and job transactions using the company's ERP system.
Devising ways to optimize inventory control procedures and inspecting the levels of business supplies and raw materials.
Analyzing data to anticipate future needs of floor stock and consumables.
Collaborating with material handling employees and other staff to ensure business goals are met.
Hiring and training inventory clerks and warehouse staff, delegating tasks, and creating schedules for them.
Preparing inventory for delivery or shipping to customers.
Ensuring that all business operations have adequate material to achieve their objectives.

education_certification.credential: BSc/BA in business administration, inventory management, supply chain management, or a relevant field is preferred or 5 years of experience in a similar role.
Certification in Production and Inventory Management (CPIM) designation is a plus.
